tap_an_item_then_tap_save: Tap an item to make changes then tap save to finish.
manage_and_update_your_finances: Manage and update your finances in one place
easily_track_your_progress: Easily track your progress over time
tip_choose_your_daily_life_currency: Tip: You should tap the currency which you use in your daily life.
input_name_and_balance_of_a_bank_account: Tip: Input the name and balance of a bank account to keep track of.
this_is_your_dashboard: Tip: This is your dashboard, after you update your finances a chart will show your progress here.
tell_us_how_to_be_valuable_to_you: Tell us how this app can be more valuable to you and we will build what you need.
thank_you_we_will_take_a_look_shortly:
Your feedback is genuinely valued here at Clink and our entire team will be reading what you have sent within the next few hours.

As feedback is what guides Clink on it's journey, what you have written is incredibly important to us, so please accept our massive thank you for letting us know your thoughts, and if you ever get any more ideas, you know what to do!
